poem:
Title: On Abrdn, In Appreciation 

A chrysalis named Abrdn,
shed vowels, unveiled strength.
Twice named, ever growing,
In the garden of finance,
Impervious to the mockingbird's tone.

Media, oh wayward sketch artist!
In haste, forget not,
The beauty in pruning,
The power in silence,
And the tale spun by the shapeless. 

A name is but a name,
Yet, Abrdn, has made it a fortress.
